Title: Relates to the personal expense allowance for residents of residential health care facilities receiving or eligible to receive supplemental security income payments
Summary: Relates to the personal expense allowance for residents of residential health care facilities receiving or eligible to receive supplemental security income payments and/or additional state payments.
LawCode: Amd ยง366, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to the personal expense allowance for residents of residential health care facilities receiving or eligible to receive supplemental security income payments and/or additional state payments
